data.title: Jose Marcelo Domingues Torezan
data.meta_description: Ecologist, ecology professor at Londrina State University since 1992, researching on ecology of Atlantic Forests, systems ecology and restoration ecology. Under- and graduate students supervisor, member, founder and past president of the Brazilian Society of Ecological Restoration and member of the Society for Ecological Restoration (SER). Coordinating Editor for the Restoration Ecology journal.
